title: My sis got hacked
body: My sis (fabulouspockee) just turn lvl 30 and spent lots of money on that account got hacked by a person in the friends list (Meth Bling Bling) and is now using her account for matches. My sis is now scared that people are going to report her and lose her account. I sent a ticket to riot games, any other solution

replies.body:
Hey RawrGasinXD,

You'll want to double check your sister's computer for any malware that may have caused the loss of your sister's account. Additionally, once any potential malware is removed, you'll want to change any passwords for any accounts that you believe may have been compromised. Regarding the ticket, so long as you sent in as much information as you could provide, you should be fine. Make sure that your sister stays on top of any updates with that ticket. Good luck!
